comment: Bro is mad jolly
I don't like ELA classes at all, but this professor genuinely made me like ELA with his approach on how he teaches compared to most ELA teachers. Take him if you can.

Overall It was a pretty easy class, as long as you show up and don't fall Behind. He is understanding and very lenient. He views literature and writing more philosophically, wanting students to use their authentic voice. Our course consisted of a semester-long project, which wasn't ever overwhelming. He curses a good bit, which always bugged me.

I took Professor Prince for 1101 and 1102 and safe to say he is one of the best professors ive ever had. He was enthusiastic and passionate about his subject. He was very kind, understanding, and changed mu view on Literature. He is very lenient with grading as long as you show effort. I would recommend any student to take him if you can.

Professor Prince is amazing! He cares about students and their success. Class isn't hard. Just some participation assignments and a couple larger assignments related your final paper. Only critique is that sometimes it takes a long time to get back grades for larger assignments. 10/10 would recommend!

Professor Prince is amazing. He cares about other people's opinions and your success. He is very helpful and communicative. Class isn't too hard. Some easy participation assignments and a final over all paper. Only critique is sometimes it takes a while to get the big assignments graded. 10/10 would recommend!
He hard funnels you into a specific theme for the paper but counteracts this grievance by only requiring it to be 1000 words long... yeah.

Take him if you can. He was really kind and gives good feedback on what you need so you can improve. The class is basically a semester long assignment that builds up on each other and as long as you show up to class and do your work it is an easy A.

Professor Prince showed time and again how much he cared for his students and their learning. He gives great feedback on all the writing assignments and if you keep up with his workload, you'll breeze through the semester. All he really asks from his students is that your writing is authentic and shows that you care for the work.
Very understanding and cares about his students, tries to make class fun and he responds to emails in a timely manner. A lot of the material he gave us was entertaining too.

I took him for 1101 and 1102 and honestly liked him. The work is super easy if you do it, if you take 1102 there is a group project which i hated but still he grades fairly easy. Honestly i would just take him because its so hard to do bad in his class he is so understanding and cares about you as a person
Awesome teacher! His class was very enjoyable and gave fun and easy assignments. If you're ever running late on completing an assignment he'll let you submit it late for full points.
I enjoyed taking professor Prince. He's passionate & caring and it's hard to fail his class... just show up and put time aside to do the work as soon as possible. this class should be an easy A.

I took Professor Prince for ENG 1101 and 1102. Best professor by far. He loves to talk during class, and I felt bad because no one would talk back. His work is very straight forward. If you're taking Eng 1101 for the first time (or second), I would highly recommend Prince! He was amazing. He also always made jokes and tried to make class fun!
Probably the best teacher I've ever had. Super lenient with due dates and understanding if you cant make them on time. His class is really fun too.
He really likes music.

excellent professor who makes sure that he is detailed enough in his assignments, he's the cool teacher that kinda looks like Hank from Breaking Bad. I would recommend his class for new students who aren't sure what teacher to take. Assignments aren't usually tough and when you submit papers he will review and give great feedback on said papers.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Mr. Prince really cares about all his students. He is super understanding and is easily accessible outside of class. He gives good feedback and allows opportunities for you to improve your writings. There were daily assignments but they were usually very short and easy. Overall had a great experience in his class.

Professor Prince cares about his students and will help you pass the class if you do the work. He allowed lots of makeup work and checked up on those who were absent. My only complaint is that he assigned us a group essay, but he's a great professor and the class as a whole is easy and has a low work load if you stay on track.

Probably one of the best english teacheres I have ever had. The work is really easy and there are only 3 essays. There is a good bit of homework but it does help prepare you for the essays and to be a better writer overall.

He gives in-depth feedback for every essay. You have the option to redo your essays for a better grade. Make sure to complete all classwork, it boosts your grade. Some of the prompts were confusing but he doesn't mind explaining or answering questions. He's super nice and friendly, 10/10 would recommend.

Prof Prince is such a good guy. He is very caring and understanding. Class work is optional to an extent, but I recommend doing all the work as it is counted positively towards the bigger stuff such as the essays. He has an exciting personality that makes the normal boring english class more engaging.

I loved his class! He does give lots of assignments, but his reasoning is to help his students as much as he can! He is very lenient on late work and sometimes gives class time to complete assignments. I'm not sure of my grade yet for this semester, but I'm certain I will finish this class with an A!
He is so caring! His class requires a good amount of writing, but he is a pretty easy grader. No tests or quizzes all writing assignments. Once again, he is SUPER sweet!!!
Professor Prince was okay. There was a large number of written assignments, class ones and essays. Not super clear on grading or assignment guidelines. The lectures felt very long.
